GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Display information about a virtual machine scale set.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create or update a VM scale set.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets a list of all VM scale sets under a resource group.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetVirtualMachineScaleSetsByLocation
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Gets all the VM scale sets under the specified subscription for the specified location.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetVirtualMachineScaleSets
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Gets a list of all VM Scale Sets in the subscription, regardless of the associated resource group. Use nextLink property in the response to get the next page of VM Scale Sets. Do this till nextLink is null to fetch all the VM Scale Sets.

OtherOperations.Name: Deallocate
OtherOperations.Description: Deallocates specific virtual machines in a VM scale set. Shuts down the virtual machines and releases the compute resources. You are not billed for the compute resources that this virtual machine scale set deallocates.

OtherOperations.Name: DeleteInstances
OtherOperations.Description: Deletes virtual machines in a VM scale set.

OtherOperations.Name: GetInstanceView
OtherOperations.Description: Gets the status of a VM scale set instance.

OtherOperations.Name: GetSkus
OtherOperations.Description: Gets a list of SKUs available for your VM scale set, including the minimum and maximum VM instances allowed for each SKU.

OtherOperations.Name: GetOSUpgradeHistory
OtherOperations.Description: Gets list of OS upgrades on a VM scale set instance.

OtherOperations.Name: PowerOff
OtherOperations.Description: Power off (stop) one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set. Note that resources are still attached and you are getting charged for the resources. Instead, use deallocate to release resources and avoid charges.

OtherOperations.Name: Restart
OtherOperations.Description: Restarts one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set.

OtherOperations.Name: PowerOn
OtherOperations.Description: Starts one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set.

OtherOperations.Name: Reapply
OtherOperations.Description: Reapplies the Virtual Machine Scale Set Virtual Machine Profile to the Virtual Machine Instances

OtherOperations.Name: Redeploy
OtherOperations.Description: Shuts down all the virtual machines in the virtual machine scale set, moves them to a new node, and powers them back on.

OtherOperations.Name: PerformMaintenance
OtherOperations.Description: Perform maintenance on one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set. Operation on instances which are not eligible for perform maintenance will be failed. Please refer to best practices for more details: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/virtual-machine-scale-sets/virtual-machine-scale-sets-maintenance-notifications

OtherOperations.Name: UpdateInstances
OtherOperations.Description: Upgrades one or more virtual machines to the latest SKU set in the VM scale set model.

OtherOperations.Name: Reimage
OtherOperations.Description: Reimages (upgrade the operating system) one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set which don't have a ephemeral OS disk, for virtual machines who have a ephemeral OS disk the virtual machine is reset to initial state.

OtherOperations.Name: ReimageAll
OtherOperations.Description: Reimages all the disks ( including data disks ) in the virtual machines in a VM scale set. This operation is only supported for managed disks.

OtherOperations.Name: ApproveRollingUpgrade
OtherOperations.Description: Approve upgrade on deferred rolling upgrades for OS disks in the virtual machines in a VM scale set.

OtherOperations.Name: ForceRecoveryServiceFabricPlatformUpdateDomainWalk
OtherOperations.Description: Manual platform update domain walk to update virtual machines in a service fabric virtual machine scale set.

OtherOperations.Name: ConvertToSinglePlacementGroup
OtherOperations.Description: Converts SinglePlacementGroup property to false for a existing virtual machine scale set.

OtherOperations.Name: SetOrchestrationServiceState
OtherOperations.Description: Changes ServiceState property for a given service

OtherOperations.Name: CancelVirtualMachineScaleSetRollingUpgrade
OtherOperations.Description: Cancels the current virtual machine scale set rolling upgrade.

OtherOperations.Name: StartOSUpgrade
OtherOperations.Description: Starts a rolling upgrade to move all virtual machine scale set instances to the latest available Platform Image OS version. Instances which are already running the latest available OS version are not affected.

OtherOperations.Name: StartExtensionUpgradeVirtualMachineScaleSetRollingUpgrade
OtherOperations.Description: Starts a rolling upgrade to move all extensions for all virtual machine scale set instances to the latest available extension version. Instances which are already running the latest extension versions are not affected.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: The operation to get the extension.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create or update an extension.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to update an extension.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The operation to delete the extension.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets a list of all extensions in a VM scale set.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the status of the latest virtual machine scale set rolling upgrade.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: The operation to get the VMSS VM extension.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create or update the VMSS VM extension.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to update the VMSS VM extension.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The operation to delete the VMSS VM extension.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: The operation to get all extensions of an instance in Virtual Machine Scaleset.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets a virtual machine from a VM scale set.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Updates a virtual machine of a VM scale set.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates a virtual machine of a VM scale set.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes a virtual machine from a VM scale set.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets a list of all virtual machines in a VM scale sets.

OtherOperations.Name: Reimage
OtherOperations.Description: Reimages (upgrade the operating system) a specific virtual machine in a VM scale set.

OtherOperations.Name: ReimageAll
OtherOperations.Description: Allows you to re-image all the disks ( including data disks ) in the a VM scale set instance. This operation is only supported for managed disks.

OtherOperations.Name: ApproveRollingUpgrade
OtherOperations.Description: Approve upgrade on deferred rolling upgrade for OS disk on a VM scale set instance.

OtherOperations.Name: Deallocate
OtherOperations.Description: Deallocates a specific virtual machine in a VM scale set. Shuts down the virtual machine and releases the compute resources it uses. You are not billed for the compute resources of this virtual machine once it is deallocated.

OtherOperations.Name: GetInstanceView
OtherOperations.Description: Gets the status of a virtual machine from a VM scale set.

OtherOperations.Name: PowerOff
OtherOperations.Description: Power off (stop) a virtual machine in a VM scale set. Note that resources are still attached and you are getting charged for the resources. Instead, use deallocate to release resources and avoid charges.

OtherOperations.Name: Restart
OtherOperations.Description: Restarts a virtual machine in a VM scale set.

OtherOperations.Name: PowerOn
OtherOperations.Description: Starts a virtual machine in a VM scale set.

OtherOperations.Name: Redeploy
OtherOperations.Description: Shuts down the virtual machine in the virtual machine scale set, moves it to a new node, and powers it back on.

OtherOperations.Name: RetrieveBootDiagnosticsData
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to retrieve SAS URIs of boot diagnostic logs for a virtual machine in a VM scale set.

OtherOperations.Name: PerformMaintenance
OtherOperations.Description: Performs maintenance on a virtual machine in a VM scale set.

OtherOperations.Name: SimulateEviction
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to simulate the eviction of spot virtual machine in a VM scale set.

OtherOperations.Name: AttachDetachDataDisks
OtherOperations.Description: Attach and detach data disks to/from a virtual machine in a VM scale set.

OtherOperations.Name: RunCommand
OtherOperations.Description: Run command on a virtual machine in a VM scale set.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: The operation to get the extension.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create or update the extension.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to update the extension.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The operation to delete the extension.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: The operation to get all extensions of a Virtual Machine.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Retrieves information about the model view or the instance view of a virtual machine.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create or update a virtual machine. Please note some properties can be set only during virtual machine creation.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to update a virtual machine.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The operation to delete a virtual machine.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all of the virtual machines in the specified resource group. Use the nextLink property in the response to get the next page of virtual machines.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetVirtualMachinesByLocation
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Gets all the virtual machines under the specified subscription for the specified location.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetVirtualMachines
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Lists all of the virtual machines in the specified subscription. Use the nextLink property in the response to get the next page of virtual machines.

OtherOperations.Name: Capture
OtherOperations.Description: Captures the VM by copying virtual hard disks of the VM and outputs a template that can be used to create similar VMs.

OtherOperations.Name: InstanceView
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves information about the run-time state of a virtual machine.

OtherOperations.Name: ConvertToManagedDisks
OtherOperations.Description: Converts virtual machine disks from blob-based to managed disks. Virtual machine must be stop-deallocated before invoking this operation.

OtherOperations.Name: Deallocate
OtherOperations.Description: Shuts down the virtual machine and releases the compute resources. You are not billed for the compute resources that this virtual machine uses.

OtherOperations.Name: Generalize
OtherOperations.Description: Sets the OS state of the virtual machine to generalized. It is recommended to sysprep the virtual machine before performing this operation. For Windows, please refer to [Create a managed image of a generalized VM in Azure](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/virtual-machines/windows/capture-image-resource). For Linux, please refer to [How to create an image of a virtual machine or VHD](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/virtual-machines/linux/capture-image).

OtherOperations.Name: GetAvailableSizes
OtherOperations.Description: Lists all available virtual machine sizes to which the specified virtual machine can be resized.

OtherOperations.Name: PowerOff
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to power off (stop) a virtual machine. The virtual machine can be restarted with the same provisioned resources. You are still charged for this virtual machine.

OtherOperations.Name: Reapply
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to reapply a virtual machine's state.

OtherOperations.Name: Restart
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to restart a virtual machine.

OtherOperations.Name: PowerOn
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to start a virtual machine.

OtherOperations.Name: Redeploy
OtherOperations.Description: Shuts down the virtual machine, moves it to a new node, and powers it back on.

OtherOperations.Name: Reimage
OtherOperations.Description: Reimages (upgrade the operating system) a virtual machine which don't have a ephemeral OS disk, for virtual machines who have a ephemeral OS disk the virtual machine is reset to initial state. NOTE: The retaining of old OS disk depends on the value of deleteOption of OS disk. If deleteOption is detach, the old OS disk will be preserved after reimage. If deleteOption is delete, the old OS disk will be deleted after reimage. The deleteOption of the OS disk should be updated accordingly before performing the reimage.

OtherOperations.Name: RetrieveBootDiagnosticsData
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to retrieve SAS URIs for a virtual machine's boot diagnostic logs.

OtherOperations.Name: PerformMaintenance
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to perform maintenance on a virtual machine.

OtherOperations.Name: SimulateEviction
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to simulate the eviction of spot virtual machine.

OtherOperations.Name: AssessPatches
OtherOperations.Description: Assess patches on the VM.

OtherOperations.Name: InstallPatches
OtherOperations.Description: Installs patches on the VM.

OtherOperations.Name: AttachDetachDataDisks
OtherOperations.Description: Attach and detach data disks to/from the virtual machine.

OtherOperations.Name: RunCommand
OtherOperations.Description: Run command on the VM.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets a virtual machine extension image.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets a list of virtual machine extension image types.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Retrieves information about an availability set.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create or update an availability set.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all availability sets in a resource group.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetAvailabilitySets
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Lists all availability sets in a subscription.

OtherOperations.Name: GetAvailableSizes
OtherOperations.Description: Lists all available virtual machine sizes that can be used to create a new virtual machine in an existing availability set.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Retrieves information about a proximity placement group .

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create or update a proximity placement group.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all proximity placement groups in a resource group.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetProximityPlacementGroups
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Lists all proximity placement groups in a subscription.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Retrieves information about a dedicated host group.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create or update a dedicated host group. For details of Dedicated Host and Dedicated Host Groups please see [Dedicated Host Documentation] (https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2082596)

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all of the dedicated host groups in the specified resource group. Use the nextLink property in the response to get the next page of dedicated host groups.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetDedicatedHostGroups
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Lists all of the dedicated host groups in the subscription. Use the nextLink property in the response to get the next page of dedicated host groups.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Retrieves information about a dedicated host.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create or update a dedicated host .

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all of the dedicated hosts in the specified dedicated host group. Use the nextLink property in the response to get the next page of dedicated hosts.

OtherOperations.Name: Restart
OtherOperations.Description: Restart the dedicated host. The operation will complete successfully once the dedicated host has restarted and is running. To determine the health of VMs deployed on the dedicated host after the restart check the Resource Health Center in the Azure Portal. Please refer to https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/service-health/resource-health-overview for more details.

OtherOperations.Name: Redeploy
OtherOperations.Description: Redeploy the dedicated host. The operation will complete successfully once the dedicated host has migrated to a new node and is running. To determine the health of VMs deployed on the dedicated host after the redeploy check the Resource Health Center in the Azure Portal. Please refer to https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/service-health/resource-health-overview for more details.

OtherOperations.Name: GetAvailableSizes
OtherOperations.Description: Lists all available dedicated host sizes to which the specified dedicated host can be resized. NOTE: The dedicated host sizes provided can be used to only scale up the existing dedicated host.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Retrieves information about an SSH public key.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a new SSH public key resource.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates a new SSH public key resource.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all of the SSH public keys in the specified resource group. Use the nextLink property in the response to get the next page of SSH public keys.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetSshPublicKeys
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Lists all of the SSH public keys in the subscription. Use the nextLink property in the response to get the next page of SSH public keys.

OtherOperations.Name: GenerateKeyPair
OtherOperations.Description: Generates and returns a public/private key pair and populates the SSH public key resource with the public key. The length of the key will be 3072 bits. This operation can only be performed once per SSH public key resource.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets an image.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create or update an image.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets the list of images under a resource group. Use nextLink property in the response to get the next page of Images. Do this till nextLink is null to fetch all the Images.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetDiskImages
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Gets the list of Images in the subscription. Use nextLink property in the response to get the next page of Images. Do this till nextLink is null to fetch all the Images.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: The operation to get the restore point collection.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create or update the restore point collection. Please refer to https://aka.ms/RestorePoints for more details. When updating a restore point collection, only tags may be modified.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to update the restore point collection.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The operation to delete the restore point collection. This operation will also delete all the contained restore points.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets the list of restore point collections in a resource group.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetRestorePointGroups
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Gets the list of restore point collections in the subscription. Use nextLink property in the response to get the next page of restore point collections. Do this till nextLink is not null to fetch all the restore point collections.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: The operation to get the restore point.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create the restore point. Updating properties of an existing restore point is not allowed

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to create the restore point. Updating properties of an existing restore point is not allowed

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The operation to delete the restore point.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: The operation that retrieves information about a capacity reservation group.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create or update a capacity reservation group. When updating a capacity reservation group, only tags and sharing profile may be modified. Please refer to https://aka.ms/CapacityReservation for more details.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to update a capacity reservation group. When updating a capacity reservation group, only tags and sharing profile may be modified.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The operation to delete a capacity reservation group. This operation is allowed only if all the associated resources are disassociated from the reservation group and all capacity reservations under the reservation group have also been deleted. Please refer to https://aka.ms/CapacityReservation for more details.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all of the capacity reservation groups in the specified resource group. Use the nextLink property in the response to get the next page of capacity reservation groups.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetCapacityReservationGroups
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Lists all of the capacity reservation groups in the subscription. Use the nextLink property in the response to get the next page of capacity reservation groups.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: The operation that retrieves information about the capacity reservation.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create or update a capacity reservation. Please note some properties can be set only during capacity reservation creation. Please refer to https://aka.ms/CapacityReservation for more details.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to update a capacity reservation.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The operation to delete a capacity reservation. This operation is allowed only when all the associated resources are disassociated from the capacity reservation. Please refer to https://aka.ms/CapacityReservation for more details.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all of the capacity reservations in the specified capacity reservation group. Use the nextLink property in the response to get the next page of capacity reservations.

GetOperations.Description: The operation to get the run command.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Lists all available run commands for a subscription in a location.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetVirtualMachineRunCommand
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Gets specific run command for a subscription in a location.

UpdateOperations.Description: Approve or reject a private endpoint connection under disk access resource, this can't be used to create a new private endpoint connection.

GetOperations.Description: Get a community gallery image version.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets a role instance from a cloud service.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes a role instance from a cloud service.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets the list of all role instances in a cloud service. Use nextLink property in the response to get the next page of role instances. Do this till nextLink is null to fetch all the role instances.

OtherOperations.Name: GetInstanceView
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves information about the run-time state of a role instance in a cloud service.

OtherOperations.Name: Restart
OtherOperations.Description: The Reboot Role Instance asynchronous operation requests a reboot of a role instance in the cloud service.

OtherOperations.Name: Reimage
OtherOperations.Description: The Reimage Role Instance asynchronous operation reinstalls the operating system on instances of web roles or worker roles.

OtherOperations.Name: Rebuild
OtherOperations.Description: The Rebuild Role Instance asynchronous operation reinstalls the operating system on instances of web roles or worker roles and initializes the storage resources that are used by them. If you do not want to initialize storage resources, you can use Reimage Role Instance.

OtherOperations.Name: GetRemoteDesktopFile
OtherOperations.Description: Gets a remote desktop file for a role instance in a cloud service.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets a role from a cloud service.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets a list of all roles in a cloud service. Use nextLink property in the response to get the next page of roles. Do this till nextLink is null to fetch all the roles.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Display information about a cloud service.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create or update a cloud service. Please note some properties can be set only during cloud service creation.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets a list of all cloud services under a resource group. Use nextLink property in the response to get the next page of Cloud Services. Do this till nextLink is null to fetch all the Cloud Services.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetCloudServices
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Gets a list of all cloud services in the subscription, regardless of the associated resource group. Use nextLink property in the response to get the next page of Cloud Services. Do this till nextLink is null to fetch all the Cloud Services.

OtherOperations.Name: GetInstanceView
OtherOperations.Description: Gets the status of a cloud service.

OtherOperations.Name: PowerOn
OtherOperations.Description: Starts the cloud service.

OtherOperations.Name: PowerOff
OtherOperations.Description: Power off the cloud service. Note that resources are still attached and you are getting charged for the resources.

OtherOperations.Name: Restart
OtherOperations.Description: Restarts one or more role instances in a cloud service.

OtherOperations.Name: Reimage
OtherOperations.Description: Reimage asynchronous operation reinstalls the operating system on instances of web roles or worker roles.

OtherOperations.Name: Rebuild
OtherOperations.Description: Rebuild Role Instances reinstalls the operating system on instances of web roles or worker roles and initializes the storage resources that are used by them. If you do not want to initialize storage resources, you can use Reimage Role Instances.

OtherOperations.Name: DeleteInstances
OtherOperations.Description: Deletes role instances in a cloud service.

OtherOperations.Name: WalkUpdateDomain
OtherOperations.Description: Updates the role instances in the specified update domain.

OtherOperations.Name: GetUpdateDomain
OtherOperations.Description: Gets the specified update domain of a cloud service. Use nextLink property in the response to get the next page of update domains. Do this till nextLink is null to fetch all the update domains.

OtherOperations.Name: GetUpdateDomains
OtherOperations.Description: Gets a list of all update domains in a cloud service.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets properties of a guest operating system version that can be specified in the XML service configuration (.cscfg) for a cloud service.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets a list of all guest operating system versions available to be specified in the XML service configuration (.cscfg) for a cloud service. Use nextLink property in the response to get the next page of OS versions. Do this till nextLink is null to fetch all the OS versions.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets properties of a guest operating system family that can be specified in the XML service configuration (.cscfg) for a cloud service.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets a list of all guest operating system families available to be specified in the XML service configuration (.cscfg) for a cloud service. Use nextLink property in the response to get the next page of OS Families. Do this till nextLink is null to fetch all the OS Families.
